verses.verse: They say<WH559>, If a man<WH376> put away<WH7971> his wife<WH802>, and she go<WH1980> from him<WH312>, and become another man<WH376>'s, will he return unto her again<WH7725>? will not that land<WH776> be greatly<WH2610> polluted<WH2610>? But thou hast played the harlot<WH2181> with many<WH7227> lovers<WH7453>; yet return again<WH7725> to me<WH5002>, saith Jehovah<WH3068>.

Lift up<WH5375> thine eyes<WH5869> unto the bare heights<WH8205>, and see<WH7200>; where<WH375> hast thou not been lain<WH7693> with<WH1870>? By the ways hast thou sat<WH3427> for them<WH6163>, as an Arabian in the wilderness<WH4057>; and thou hast polluted<WH2610> the land<WH776> with thy whoredoms<WH2184> and with thy wickedness<WH7451>.

Therefore the showers<WH7241> have been withholden<WH4513>, and there hath been no latter rain<WH4456>; yet thou hast a harlot<WH2181>'s forehead<WH4696>, thou refusedst<WH3985> to be ashamed<WH3637>.
Wilt thou not from this time cry<WH7121> unto me<WH1>, My Father, thou art the guide<WH441> of my youth<WH5271>?

Will he retain<WH5201> his anger for ever<WH5769>? will he keep<WH8104> it to the end<WH5331>? Behold<WH1696>, thou hast spoken and hast done<WH6213> evil things<WH7451>, and hast had thy way<WH3201>.

Moreover Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto me in the days<WH3117> of Josiah<WH2977> the king<WH4428>, Hast thou seen<WH7200> that which backsliding<WH4878> Israel<WH3478> hath done<WH6213>? she is gone up<WH1980> upon every high<WH1364> mountain<WH2022> and under<WH8478> every green<WH7488> tree<WH6086>, and there hath played the harlot<WH2181>.

And I said<WH559> after<WH310> she had done<WH6213> all these things<WH7725>, She will return unto me<WH7725>; but she returned not<WH901>: and her treacherous sister<WH269> Judah<WH3063> saw it<WH7200>.

And I saw<WH7200>, when<WH182>, for this very cause that backsliding<WH4878> Israel<WH3478> had committed adultery<WH5003>, I had put her away<WH7971> and given<WH5414> her a bill<WH5612> of divorcement<WH3748>, yet treacherous<WH898> Judah<WH3063> her sister<WH269> feared<WH3372> not<WH3212>; but she also went and played the harlot<WH2181>.
And it came to pass through the lightness<WH6963> of her whoredom<WH2184>, that the land<WH776> was polluted<WH2610>, and she committed adultery<WH5003> with stones<WH68> and with stocks<WH6086>.
And yet for all this her treacherous<WH901> sister<WH269> Judah<WH3063> hath not returned<WH7725> unto me with her whole heart<WH3820>, but feignedly<WH8267>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto me<WH4878>, Backsliding Israel<WH3478> hath showed herself<WH5315> more righteous<WH6663> than treacherous<WH898> Judah<WH3063>.

Go <WH1980>, and proclaim<WH7121> these words<WH1697> toward the north<WH6828>, and say<WH559>, Return<WH7725>, thou backsliding<WH4878> Israel<WH3478>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>; I will not look<WH5307> in anger<WH6440> upon you<WH2623>; for I am merciful, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, I will not keep<WH5201> anger for ever<WH5769>.

Only acknowledge<WH3045> thine iniquity<WH5771>, that thou hast transgressed<WH6586> against Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, and hast scattered<WH6340> thy ways<WH1870> to the strangers<WH2114> under every green<WH7488> tree<WH6086>, and ye have not obeyed<WH8085> my voice<WH6963>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>.

Return <WH7725>, O backsliding<WH7726> children<WH1121>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>; for I am a husband<WH1166> unto you<WH3947>: and I will take you one<WH259> of a city<WH5892>, and two<WH8147> of a family<WH4940>, and I will bring<WH935> you to Zion<WH6726>:
and I will give<WH5414> you shepherds<WH7462> according to my heart<WH3820>, who shall feed<WH7462> you with knowledge<WH1844> and understanding<WH7919>.

And it shall come to pass<WH7235>, when ye are multiplied and increased<WH6509> in the land<WH776>, in those days<WH3117>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, they shall say<WH559> no more<WH727>, The ark of the covenant<WH1285> of Jehovah<WH3068>; neither shall it come<WH5927> to mind<WH3820>; neither shall they remember<WH2142> it<WH6485>; neither shall they miss it<WH6213>; neither shall it be made any more.

At that time<WH6256> they shall call<WH7121> Jerusalem<WH3389> the throne<WH3678> of Jehovah<WH3068>; and all the nations<WH1471> shall be gathered<WH6960> unto it<WH8034>, to the name of Jehovah<WH3068>, to Jerusalem<WH3389>: neither shall they walk<WH3212> any more after<WH310> the stubbornness<WH8307> of their evil<WH7451> heart<WH3820>.

In those days<WH3117> the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063> shall walk<WH3212> with the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, and they shall come<WH935> together<WH3162> out of the land<WH776> of the north<WH6828> to the land<WH776> that I gave for an inheritance<WH5157> unto your fathers<WH1>.

But I said<WH559>, How I will put<WH7896> thee among the children<WH1121>, and give<WH5414> thee a pleasant<WH2532> land<WH776>, a goodly<WH6643> heritage<WH5159> of the hosts<WH6635> of the nations<WH1471>! and I said<WH559>, Ye shall call<WH7121> me My Father<WH1>, and shall not turn away<WH7725> from following me<WH310>.

Surely <WH403> as a wife<WH802> treacherously<WH898> departeth from her husband<WH7453>, so have ye dealt treacherously<WH898> with me<WH1004>, O house of Israel<WH3478>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>.

A voice<WH6963> is heard<WH8085> upon the bare heights<WH8205>, the weeping<WH1065> and the supplications<WH8469> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>; because they have perverted<WH5753> their way<WH1870>, they have forgotten<WH7911> Jehovah<WH3068> their God<WH430>.
Return <WH7725>, ye backsliding<WH7726> children<WH1121>, I will heal<WH7495> your backslidings<WH4878>. Behold<WH857>, we are come unto thee<WH3068>; for thou art Jehovah our God<WH430>.

Truly <WH403> in vain<WH8267> is the help that is looked for from the hills<WH1389>, the tumult<WH1995> on the mountains<WH2022>: truly<WH403> in Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430> is the salvation<WH8668> of Israel<WH3478>.

But the shameful<WH1322> thing hath devoured<WH398> the labor<WH3018> of our fathers<WH1> from our youth<WH5271>, their flocks<WH6629> and their herds<WH1241>, their sons<WH1121> and their daughters<WH1323>.

Let us lie down<WH7901> in our shame<WH1322>, and let our confusion<WH3639> cover<WH3680> us<WH2398>; for we have sinned against Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430>, we and our fathers<WH1>, from our youth<WH5271> even unto this day<WH3117>; and we have not obeyed<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430>.
